short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read websites in the language you're learning, translate words you don't know, and we'll create flashcards to help you remember.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learn a language while surfing the web!

Visit articles in the language you're learning. Use Readlang to translate the words and phrases you don't understand. And we'll create flashcards and vocab lists for you.

- Visit a webpage in the language you are learning.

- Click the "R" button to open Readlang.

- Click on any word, or drag across any phrase to translate.

Supercharge your language learning!

Alternatively, right click on any webpage and select "Import to Readlang" to import a plain text version to read on readlang.com


As featured on Lifehacker: http://lifehacker.com/readlang-helps-you-learn-a-foreign-language-as-you-surf-1697991769
